enWisdom: The suspicious person is always sick
The innocent one is healthy, the suspicious one is sick
Doubt puts out the light of the heart
When suspicion appears, thoughts [about others] become negative

Wisdom: عَلَى الشَّكِّ وَقِلَّةِ الثِّقَةِ بِاللَّهِ مَبْنَى الْحِرْصِ وَالشُّحِّ
enWisdom: It is on doubt and lack of trust in Allah that greed and avarice are based
One who falters increases his doubt
The suspicious one is never found in a sound state

Wisdom: مَنْ عَمِيَ عَمَّا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ غَرَسَ الشَّكَّ بَيْنَ جَنْبَيْهِ
enWisdom: One who is blind to that which is in front of him instils doubt within himself
